soft_x_rays/channel.documentation: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic.

soft_x_rays/channel/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/detector.documentation: Detector description. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/geometry_ty.documentation: Type of geometry used to describe the surface of the detector or aperture (1:'outline', 2:'circular', 3:'rectangle'). In case of 'outline', the surface is described by an outline of point in a local coordinate system defined by a centre and three unit vectors X1, X2, X3. Note that there is some flexibility here and the data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the object, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below. In case of 'circular', the surface is a circle defined by its centre, radius, and normal vector oriented towards the plasma X3.  In case of 'rectangle', the surface is a rectangle defined by its centre, widths in the X1 and X2 directions, and normal vector oriented towards the plasma X3. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/centre.documentation: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/centre/r.documentation: Major radius. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within centre container: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/centre/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within centre container: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/centre/z.documentation: Height. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within centre container: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/radius.documentation: Radius of the circle, used only if geometry_type = 2. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/x1_unit_vec.documentation: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description.

Component along X axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Component along Y axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Component along Z axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/x2_unit_vec.documentation: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description.

Component along X axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Component along Y axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Component along Z axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/x3_unit_vec.documentation: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description.

Component along X axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma.

Component along Y axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma.

Component along Z axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/x1_width.documentation: Full width of the aperture in the X1 direction, used only if geometry_type = 3. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/x2_width.documentation: Full width of the aperture in the X2 direction, used only if geometry_type = 3. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/outline.documentation: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/outline/x1.documentation: Positions along x1 axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/outline/x2.documentation: Positions along x2 axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

soft_x_rays/channel/detector/surface.documentation: Surface of the detector/aperture, derived from the above geometric data. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Detector description.

soft_x_rays/channel/aperture.documentation: Description of a set of collimating apertures. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/aperture/geometry_ty.documentation: Type of geometry used to describe the surface of the detector or aperture (1:'outline', 2:'circular', 3:'rectangle'). Note that there is some flexibility here and the data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the object, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below. In case of 'circular', the surface is a circle defined by its centre, radius, and normal vector oriented towards the plasma X3.  In case of 'rectangle', the surface is a rectangle defined by its centre, widths in the X1 and X2 directions, and normal vector oriented towards the plasma X3. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within aperture container: Description of a set of collimating apertures.

soft_x_rays/channel/aperture/outline.documentation: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within aperture container: Description of a set of collimating apertures.

soft_x_rays/channel/aperture/outline/x1.documentation: Positions along x1 axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within aperture container: Description of a set of collimating apertures. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

soft_x_rays/channel/aperture/outline/x2.documentation: Positions along x2 axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

soft_x_rays/channel/aperture/surface.documentation: Surface of the detector/aperture, derived from the above geometric data. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within aperture container: Description of a set of collimating apertures.

soft_x_rays/channel/etendue.documentation: Etendue (geometric extent) of the channel's optical system. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/etendue_method.documentation: Method used to calculate the etendue. Index = 0 : exact calculation with a 4D integral; 1 : approximation with first order formula (detector surface times solid angle subtended by the apertures); 2 : other methods. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/etendue_method/name.documentation: Short string identifier. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within etendue_method container: Method used to calculate the etendue. Index = 0 : exact calculation with a 4D integral; 1 : approximation with first order formula (detector surface times solid angle subtended by the apertures); 2 : other methods.

soft_x_rays/channel/etendue_method/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within etendue_method container: Method used to calculate the etendue. Index = 0 : exact calculation with a 4D integral; 1 : approximation with first order formula (detector surface times solid angle subtended by the apertures); 2 : other methods.

soft_x_rays/channel/etendue_method/descr.documentation: Verbose description. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within etendue_method container: Method used to calculate the etendue. Index = 0 : exact calculation with a 4D integral; 1 : approximation with first order formula (detector surface times solid angle subtended by the apertures); 2 : other methods.

soft_x_rays/channel/line_of_sight.documentation: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/line_of_sight/first_.documentation: Position of the first point. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points.

Major radius. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

soft_x_rays/channel/line_of_sight/second.documentation: Position of the second point. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points.

Major radius. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window.documentation: Set of filter windows. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/descri.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/geomet.documentation: Geometry of the filter contour. Note that there is some flexibility in the choice of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3). The data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the filter, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

options.name: polygonal
options.description: Contour described by a polygonal outline in the (X1, X2) plane

options.name: circular
options.description: Circle in the (X1, X2) plane, defined by its centre and radius

options.name: rectangle
options.description: Rectangle in the (X1, X2) plane, defined by its centre and widths in the X1 and X2 directions

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/geomet.documentation: Short string identifier. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within geometry_type container: Geometry of the filter contour. Note that there is some flexibility in the choice of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3). The data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the filter, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below.

Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within geometry_type container: Geometry of the filter contour. Note that there is some flexibility in the choice of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3). The data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the filter, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below.

Verbose description. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within geometry_type container: Geometry of the filter contour. Note that there is some flexibility in the choice of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3). The data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the filter, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/curvat.documentation: Curvature of the filter. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

options.name: cylindrical_x1
options.description: Cylindrical in the X1 direction, use x1_curvature

options.name: cylindrical_x2
options.description: Cylindrical in the X2 direction, use x2_curvature

options.name: spherical
options.description: Spherical : same curvature radius in X1 and X2 directions, indicated in x1_curvature

options.name: toroidal
options.description: Toroidal : x1_curvature in X1 direction and x2_curvature in X2 direction

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/curvat.documentation: Short string identifier. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within curvature_type container: Curvature of the filter.

Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within curvature_type container: Curvature of the filter.

Verbose description. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within curvature_type container: Curvature of the filter.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/centre.documentation: Coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the filter. This origin is located within the filter area and should be the middle point of the filter surface. If geometry_type=2, it's the centre of the circular filter. If geometry_type=3, it's the centre of the rectangular filter. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

Major radius. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within centre container: Coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the filter. This origin is located within the filter area and should be the middle point of the filter surface. If geometry_type=2, it's the centre of the circular filter. If geometry_type=3, it's the centre of the rectangular filter.

Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within centre container: Coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the filter. This origin is located within the filter area and should be the middle point of the filter surface. If geometry_type=2, it's the centre of the circular filter. If geometry_type=3, it's the centre of the rectangular filter.

Height. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within centre container: Coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the filter. This origin is located within the filter area and should be the middle point of the filter surface. If geometry_type=2, it's the centre of the circular filter. If geometry_type=3, it's the centre of the rectangular filter.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/radius.documentation: Radius of the circle, used only if geometry_type/index = 2. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/x1_uni.documentation: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

Component along X axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Component along Y axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Component along Z axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/x2_uni.documentation: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

Component along X axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Component along Y axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Component along Z axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/x3_uni.documentation: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the filter surface and oriented towards the plasma. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

Component along X axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the filter surface and oriented towards the plasma.

Component along Y axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the filter surface and oriented towards the plasma.

Component along Z axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the filter surface and oriented towards the plasma.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/x1_wid.documentation: Full width of the filter in the X1 direction, used only if geometry_type/index = 3. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/x2_wid.documentation: Full width of the filter in the X2 direction, used only if geometry_type/index = 3. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/outlin.documentation: Irregular outline of the filter in the (X1, X2) coordinate system, used only if geometry_type/index=1. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

Positions along x1 axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the filter in the (X1, X2) coordinate system, used only if geometry_type/index=1. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

Positions along x2 axis. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the filter in the (X1, X2) coordinate system, used only if geometry_type/index=1. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/x1_cur.documentation: Radius of curvature in the X1 direction, to be filled only for curvature_type/index = 2, 4 or 5. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/x2_cur.documentation: Radius of curvature in the X2 direction, to be filled only for curvature_type/index = 3 or 5. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/surfac.documentation: Surface of the filter, derived from the above geometric data. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/materi.documentation: Material of the filter window. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

Short string identifier. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within material container: Material of the filter window.

Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within material container: Material of the filter window.

Verbose description. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows. Within material container: Material of the filter window.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/thickn.documentation: Thickness of the filter window. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/wavele.documentation: Lower bound of the filter wavelength range. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

Upper bound of the filter wavelength range. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

Array of wavelength values. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

soft_x_rays/channel/filter_window/photon.documentation: Probability of absorbing a photon passing through the filter as a function of its wavelength. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within filter_window container: Set of filter windows.

soft_x_rays/channel/energy_band.documentation: Set of energy bands in which photons are counted by the detector. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/energy_band/lower_bo.documentation: Lower bound of the energy band. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within energy_band container: Set of energy bands in which photons are counted by the detector.

soft_x_rays/channel/energy_band/upper_bo.documentation: Upper bound of the energy band. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within energy_band container: Set of energy bands in which photons are counted by the detector.

soft_x_rays/channel/energy_band/energies.documentation: Array of discrete energy values inside the band. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within energy_band container: Set of energy bands in which photons are counted by the detector.

soft_x_rays/channel/energy_band/detectio.documentation: Probability of detection of a photon impacting the detector as a function of its energy. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within energy_band container: Set of energy bands in which photons are counted by the detector.

soft_x_rays/channel/brightness.documentation: Power flux received by the detector, per unit solid angle and per unit area (i.e. power divided by the etendue), in multiple energy bands if available from the detector. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/brightness/data.documentation: Data. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within brightness container: Power flux received by the detector, per unit solid angle and per unit area (i.e. power divided by the etendue), in multiple energy bands if available from the detector.

soft_x_rays/channel/brightness/time.documentation: Time. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within brightness container: Power flux received by the detector, per unit solid angle and per unit area (i.e. power divided by the etendue), in multiple energy bands if available from the detector.

soft_x_rays/channel/power.documentation: Power received on the detector, in multiple energy bands if available from the detector. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/power/data.documentation: Data. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within power container: Power received on the detector, in multiple energy bands if available from the detector.

soft_x_rays/channel/power/time.documentation: Time. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within power container: Power received on the detector, in multiple energy bands if available from the detector.

soft_x_rays/channel/validity_timed.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the channel as a function of time (0 means valid, negative values mean non-valid). Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/channel/validity_timed/data.documentation: Data. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within validity_timed container: Indicator of the validity of the channel as a function of time (0 means valid, negative values mean non-valid).

soft_x_rays/channel/validity_timed/time.documentation: Time. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within validity_timed container: Indicator of the validity of the channel as a function of time (0 means valid, negative values mean non-valid).

soft_x_rays/channel/validity.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the channel for the whole acquisition period (0 means valid, negative values mean non-valid). Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

soft_x_rays/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between physical information received by the detector and data available on the real-time (RT) network. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic.

soft_x_rays/time.documentation: Generic time. Within soft_x_rays IDS: Soft X-rays tomography diagnostic.
